original_text: Do pay more attention. That was an ally you hit.
zhtw: 請多加注意，你擊中的是友軍。

original_text: Um...that one seems to be one of our own...
zhtw: 嗯……那好像是我們的友軍……

original_text: Look closely. That is an ally.
zhtw: 仔細看，那是友軍。

original_text: Nothing could be more inelegant than fighting among ourselves.
zhtw: 沒有比自相殞地更不雅的事了。

original_text: Erm, I believe that is an ally...
zhtw: 呃……我相信那是友軍……

original_text: The ammo rack has been damaged.
zhtw: 彈藥架受損了。

original_text: Eek!...The ammo rack has been hit.
zhtw: 呀！……彈藥架被擊中了！

original_text: It appears they are targeting the ammo rack.
zhtw: 敵人似乎在瞄準我們的彈藥架。

original_text: The ammo rack is taking fire. Stay calm and attend to the matter.
zhtw: 彈藥架遭到攻擊。保持冷靜，處理這件事。

original_text: It seems you must pierce its armor with something else.
zhtw: 看來得用其他方式穿透它的裝甲。

original_text: You should try aiming for its weak spot next.
zhtw: 試著瞄準它的弱點。

original_text: Roger that.
zhtw: 收到。

original_text: Unlike a scone, this armor is not so easily torn.
zhtw: 不像司康餅，這裝甲可沒那麼容易被撕裂。

original_text: Penetration failed. According to the data, our chance of penetrating that spot is low.
zhtw: 穿透失敗。根據數據，那個部位的穿透機率很低。

original_text: It doesn't seem like we've penetrated their armor.
zhtw: 似乎沒能穿透他們的裝甲。

original_text: Just as in my data, we've penetrated their armor.
zhtw: 如我的數據預測，我們穿透了他們的裝甲。

original_text: They are taking damage.
zhtw: 敵方正在受損。

original_text: We have successfully penetrated their armor.
zhtw: 我們成功穿透了他們的裝甲。

original_text: According to the data, that was their weak spot.
zhtw: 根據數據，那是他們的弱點。

original_text: Hehehe... That pierced their armor.
zhtw: 呵呵……那一擊穿透了他們的裝甲。

original_text: Have you heard the English saying, "All's fair in love and war"?
zhtw: 你聽過英國諺語「愛與戰爭無所禁忌」嗎？

original_text: You have damaged the enemy tank. All is fair in love and war, you know.
zhtw: 你擊傷了敵方戰車。愛與戰爭無所禁忌，你知道的。

original_text: They are hit. It's working.
zhtw: 敵方被擊中。有效果。

original_text: We've hit them, but...
zhtw: 我們擊中了他們，但是……

original_text: It seems that one's ricocheted.
zhtw: 好像彈開了。

original_text: Huh!? Ricochet!?
zhtw: 咦！？彈開了！？

original_text: Do not worry. Just make the next one count.
zhtw: 別擔心，讓下一擊命中。

original_text: Your shot bounced, but do not fret. Simply relax and load the next shell.
zhtw: 你的炮彈彈開了，別急，放鬆點，裝填下一發。

original_text: Got it!
zhtw: 明白了！

original_text: That shot ricocheted. Try aiming for their weak spot next time.
zhtw: 那一發彈開了。下次試著瞄準他們的弱點。

original_text: Ricochet confirmed.
zhtw: 確認彈開。

original_text: Penetration failed. That one bounced.
zhtw: 穿透失敗。那發彈開了。

original_text: Shots will ricochet from time to time. Stay calm and focus on the next one.
zhtw: 炮彈偶爾會彈開。保持冷靜，專注下一發。

original_text: We've hit them but didn't penetrate their armor.
zhtw: 我們擊中了，但沒穿透他們的裝甲。

original_text: That shot bounced. Perhaps your firing angle was off.
zhtw: 那一發彈開了。或許是射擊角度不對。

original_text: I'll collect the data on the ricochet angle.
zhtw: 我會收集關於彈開角度的數據。

original_text: According to the data, that one should have penetrated them...
zhtw: 根據數據，那一發應該能穿透他們……

original_text: You almost had them.
zhtw: 你差點就擊中了。

original_text: Ricochet. Perhaps the angle wasn't right.
zhtw: 彈開了。或許角度不對。

original_text: The shell is landing. Let's make the next one count.
zhtw: 炮彈落地了。讓下一發命中吧。

original_text: Their armor deflected it.
zhtw: 他們的裝甲把炮彈彈開了。

original_text: Ricochet. I'll load the next shell shortly.
zhtw: 彈開了。我馬上裝填下一發。

original_text: It seems the shell has bounced. Perhaps we should adjust the angle.
zhtw: 炮彈似乎彈開了。或許該調整角度。

original_text: Darjeeling-sama! Are you alright?
zhtw: 大吉嶺大人！您沒事吧？

original_text: Darjeeling! Are you okay?
zhtw: 大吉嶺！你還好嗎？

original_text: Ungh... I think I need to take a short rest...
zhtw: 呃……我想我需要稍作休息……

original_text: Darjeeling! Are you hurt?
zhtw: 大吉嶺！你受傷了嗎？

original_text: This enemy is stronger than I gave them credit for!
zhtw: 這個敵人比我想的還要強！

original_text: Ungh... I most definitely felt that blow!
zhtw: 呃……我確實感受到那一擊了！

original_text: They are giving us quite the fight... However, that stops now!
zhtw: 他們給了我們相當的挑戰……但現在得結束了！

original_text: Well done... However, I can still fight on!
zhtw: 幹得好……不過，我還能繼續戰鬥！

original_text: They've got the better of us...
zhtw: 他們占了上風……

original_text: Seems like this is as far as we go...
zhtw: 似乎我們只能到此為止了……

original_text: I shall not forget this defeat.
zhtw: 我不會忘記這場敗仗。

original_text: Have we been defeated? Worry not, for we simply need to lead an organized retreat.
zhtw: 我們被擊敗了？別擔心，我們只需有條不紊地撤退。

original_text: Stay elegant even in defeat. That is the St. Gloriana way.
zhtw: 即便失敗，也要保持優雅，這是聖葛羅莉安娜的風範。

original_text: That was so close.
zhtw: 好險，差一點。

original_text: The next one will be a direct hit.
zhtw: 下一發會直接命中。

original_text: Do you think you can land your next shot?
zhtw: 你認為下一發能命中嗎？

original_text: Yes, the data has been taken.
zhtw: 是的，數據已記錄。

original_text: That was close.
zhtw: 好險。

original_text: You just missed a direct hit.
zhtw: 你差點就直接命中了。

original_text: It seems they hit the driver's seat. I need a status report.
zhtw: 敵人似乎擊中了駕駛位。我需要狀況報告。

original_text: The diver's seat has been hit. Our mobility is reduced.
zhtw: 駕駛位被擊中。我們的機動性降低了。

original_text: The driver's seat is hit. I will check on it.
zhtw: 駕駛位被擊中。我去檢查。

original_text: The driver's seat has been hit. Be ready for reduced mobility.
zhtw: 駕駛位被擊中。準備應對機動性降低。

original_text: The enemy tank is in flames.
zhtw: 敵方戰車起火了。

original_text: The enemy tank seems to be on fire.
zhtw: 敵方戰車好像起火了。

original_text: The enemy tank is on fire.
zhtw: 敵方戰車在燃燒。

original_text: The enemy tank is catching fire. Have we taken it a little too far...?
zhtw: 敵方戰車起火了。我們是不是有點過火了……？

original_text: The enemy tank is on fire. Luck seems to have taken our side.
zhtw: 敵方戰車起火了。運氣似乎站在我們這邊。

original_text: The enemy tank's in flames. Their fuel tank seems to have caught fire.
zhtw: 敵方戰車在燃燒。看來是他們的燃料箱著火了。

original_text: That is quite the fire burning there.
zhtw: 那火焰燒得真旺。

original_text: The enemy tank has been set ablaze. Should we push further?
zhtw: 敵方戰車被點燃了。我們要繼續進攻嗎？

original_text: Oh, would you look at that fire. Perhaps we should have taken it easier on them.
zhtw: 哦，看那火焰。或許我們該對他們手下留情。

original_text: The enemy tank has caught fire.
zhtw: 敵方戰車起火了。

original_text: That is quite the blaze.
zhtw: 那火勢真不小。

original_text: I see fire in the enemy tank.
zhtw: 我看到敵方戰車起火了。

original_text: I can confirm that the enemy tank has been destroyed.
zhtw: 我確認敵方戰車已被摧毀。

original_text: Enemy tank disabled.
zhtw: 敵方戰車已無力化。

original_text: The enemy tank has been destroyed.
zhtw: 敵方戰車已被摧毀。

original_text: Enemy tank destroyed. Keep up the good work.
zhtw: 敵方戰車摧毀。繼續保持。

original_text: That is one less enemy to worry about.
zhtw: 少了一個敵人需要擔心。

original_text: I have confirmed the destruction of a single enemy tank.
zhtw: 我確認一輛敵方戰車已被摧毀。

original_text: We did it! We've taken out the enemy tank!
zhtw: 成功了！我們擊毀了敵方戰車！

original_text: This battle will be over before I can have my second cup of tea.
zhtw: 這場戰鬥會在我喝第二杯茶前結束。

original_text: Well, so much for that particular scone.
zhtw: 嗯，那塊司康餅算是完了。

original_text: Now, we need only to enjoy the taste.
zhtw: 現在，我們只需享受這滋味。

original_text: Hehehe... Farewell then.
zhtw: 呵呵……那就再會了。

original_text: Enemy tank destroyed. Assam's reliance on data has its benefits on occasion.
zhtw: 敵方戰車摧毀。阿薩姆對數據的依賴偶爾也有回報。

original_text: Enemy tank destroyed!
zhtw: 敵方戰車摧毀！

original_text: Victories depend on the turn of fortune, you see.
zhtw: 勝利取決於運氣的轉向，你明白的。

original_text: We have eliminated the enemy tank.
zhtw: 我們消滅了敵方戰車。

original_text: Enemy tank destroyed. Time to move on to the next target.
zhtw: 敵方戰車摧毀。準備轉向下一個目標。

original_text: Copy that.
zhtw: 收到。

original_text: We did it! Enemy tank destroyed!
zhtw: 成功了！敵方戰車摧毀！

original_text: There is no place for carelessness in our elegant Sensha-do.
zhtw: 我們優雅的戰車道不容絲毫疏忽。

original_text: We stay focused for the next one.
zhtw: 我們專注於下一個目標。

original_text: Got it!
zhtw: 明白了！

original_text: The engine is taking fire. Give me a status report.
zhtw: 引擎遭到攻擊。給我狀況報告。

original_text: The engine has taken a hit. Could I have you fix it?
zhtw: 引擎被擊中了。請修復它。

original_text: Yes!
zhtw: 好的！

original_text: The engine has been damaged. Be ready for reduced mobility.
zhtw: 引擎受損。準備應對機動性降低。

original_text: The engine has taken a hit. Remain calm though; you can still move.
zhtw: 引擎被擊中。保持冷靜，你仍能移動。

original_text: The engine is damaged. Remain calm and see to its repairs.
zhtw: 引擎受損。保持冷靜，進行修復。

original_text: They are aiming for the engine. Careful, your mobility has been reduced.
zhtw: 他們在瞄準引擎。小心，機動性已降低。

original_text: That noise... It sounds like engine damage. Proceed carefully.
zhtw: 那聲音……聽起來像引擎受損。小心前進。

original_text: The engine is destroyed. We cannot move unless it's repaired.
zhtw: 引擎被毀。除非修復，否則我們無法移動。

original_text: We can't move. Repair the engine quickly!
zhtw: 動不了了。快修引擎！

original_text: The engine is destroyed. You must see to its repairs immediately.
zhtw: 引擎被毀。立即進行修復。

original_text: The engine is broken. Let's stay calm and repair it.
zhtw: 引擎壞了。保持冷靜，修復它。

original_text: The engine repairs are complete. You should be able to move again.
zhtw: 引擎修復完成。你應該能再次移動了。

original_text: The engine repairs are completed. However, our mobility is still reduced.
zhtw: 引擎修復完成。但機動性仍受限。

original_text: The engine is up and running again. Mobility should be restored now.
zhtw: 引擎重新運作。機動性應已恢復。

original_text: The engine has been repaired. We can move now.
zhtw: 引擎修好了。我們現在能移動了。

original_text: A fire has started. Remain calm while you put it out.
zhtw: 起火了。保持冷靜，滅火。

original_text: Can I ask you to put it out?
zhtw: 能否請你滅火？

original_text: Got it.
zhtw: 明白了。

original_text: Watch out for that fire. Make sure to extinguish it quickly.
zhtw: 注意火勢。確保迅速滅火。

original_text: We've caught fire. Put it out quickly.
zhtw: 我們起火了。快滅火。

original_text: Ow! A fire has broken out!
zhtw: 哎呀！火燒起來了！

original_text: A fire has started. Let's work together to put it out.
zhtw: 起火了。我們一起滅火吧。

original_text: A fire has erupted. Put it out as swiftly as possible.
zhtw: 火勢爆發。盡快滅火。

original_text: We have a fire on our hands. Prepare to respond at once.
zhtw: 我們遇到火情。立即準備應對。

original_text: The fire has been put out.
zhtw: 火已撲滅。

original_text: We've put the fire out.
zhtw: 我們把火滅了。

original_text: The fire is out. Return to your stations.
zhtw: 火已滅。回到崗位。

original_text: The fire has been extinguished!
zhtw: 火已撲滅！

original_text: Thank you Pekoe.
zhtw: 謝謝你，白毫。

original_text: You extinguished the fire. That is a relief.
zhtw: 你滅了火。真是鬆一口氣。

original_text: The fuel tank has taken damage. Watch for fires.
zhtw: 燃料箱受損。注意火勢。

original_text: They hit the fuel tank. I do not think it can take another.
zhtw: 燃料箱被擊中。恐怕再也承受不住了。

original_text: The fuel tank has been damaged. The chances of catching fire have increased.
zhtw: 燃料箱受損。起火機率增加了。

original_text: The fuel tank has been hit. The risk of catching fire is more likely.
zhtw: 燃料箱被擊中。起火風險更高了。

original_text: The fuel tank has taken a hit. Let's watch out for a fire.
zhtw: 燃料箱被擊中。注意火勢。

original_text: The gunner seat is taking fire. Status report!
zhtw: 砲手位置遭到攻擊。狀況報告！

original_text: Assam, are you alright?
zhtw: 阿薩姆，你沒事吧？

original_text: Ouch! They are aiming for the gunner's seat...
zhtw: 哎唷！他們在瞄準砲手位置……

original_text: Gunner's seat hit. Well played...
zhtw: 砲手位置被擊中。打得好……

original_text: The gun has been damaged. Its accuracy has decreased.
zhtw: 主砲受損。準確度下降了。

original_text: Gun damaged. We cannot aim properly.
zhtw: 主砲受損。我們無法精準瞄準。

original_text: That sounded like the gun taking damage. Be mindful of its reduced accuracy.
zhtw: 那聲音像是主砲受損。注意準確度下降。

original_text: The gun seems to have taken damage.
zhtw: 主砲好像受損了。

original_text: The gun has been destroyed. We cannot shoot.
zhtw: 主砲被毀。我們無法開火。

original_text: They've destroyed the gun. We are unable to shoot.
zhtw: 主砲被他們摧毀。我們無法射擊。

original_text: The gun is out of action. Try to remain calm and see to its repairs.
zhtw: 主砲失靈。保持冷靜，進行修復。

original_text: Copy!
zhtw: 收到！

original_text: The gun repairs are completed. But its accuracy remains reduced.
zhtw: 主砲修復完成。但準確度仍受限。

original_text: The gun is functional again. We can shoot now.
zhtw: 主砲恢復運作。我們現在能開火了。

original_text: We've repaired the gun. Though its accuracy is still reduced.
zhtw: 我們修好了主砲。雖然準確度仍受限。

original_text: The gun has been repaired. Commence the counterattack.
zhtw: 主砲修好了。展開反擊。

original_text: The loader's seat has been hit. Pekoe, give me a status report.
zhtw: 裝填手位置被擊中。白毫，給我狀況報告。

original_text: Eek!...They are aiming for the loader's seat...
zhtw: 呀！……他們在瞄準裝填手位置……

original_text: The loader has been hit. You need to seek cover.
zhtw: 裝填手被擊中。你需要尋找掩護。

original_text: They've hit the loader's seat. Pekoe, you okay?
zhtw: 裝填手位置被擊中。白毫，你沒事吧？

original_text: The radio operator has been hit. I need a status report.
zhtw: 通訊員被擊中。我需要狀況報告。

original_text: They were targeting the radio operator. Is everyone all right?
zhtw: 敵人瞄準了通訊員。大家都沒事吧？

original_text: The radio operator is injured. Our ability to coordinate with allies has been affected.
zhtw: 通訊員受傷。我們與盟友的協調能力受到影響。

original_text: The radio operator has been injured. Let's stay calm and provide first aid.
zhtw: 通訊員受傷了。保持冷靜，提供急救。

original_text: The radio has been damaged. Our communications will be disrupted.
zhtw: 無線電受損。我們的通訊將受干擾。

original_text: The radio has been hit. This will reduce our effective communication range.
zhtw: 無線電被擊中。這會降低我們的有效通訊範圍。

original_text: We have lost our long-range communications. The radio appears to be damaged.
zhtw: 我們失去了遠程通訊。無線電似乎壞了。

original_text: The radio is damaged. Long-range communications will be unstable for a while.
zhtw: 無線電受損。遠程通訊暫時不穩定。

original_text: They are trying to disable the radio. Their goal is to disrupt our coordination.
zhtw: 敵人試圖破壞無線電。他們的目的是干擾我們的協調。

original_text: The radio seems to have stopped working.
zhtw: 無線電好像停止運作了。

original_text: Commence Operation Fish and Chips with Vinegar!
zhtw: 啟動「炸魚薯條加醋」行動！

original_text: Ah, my tea stem is floating upright. Did you know that this means someone wonderful will pay you a visit?
zhtw: 啊，我的茶梗豎起來了。你知道這代表有貴客來訪嗎？

original_text: With all due respect, they're already here, whether they are "wonderful" or not...
zhtw: 恕我直言，他們已經來了，不管是不是「貴客」……

original_text: This will be an interesting battle.
zhtw: 這將是一場有趣的戰鬥。

original_text: With all due respect, the data shows that this will be a tough battle.
zhtw: 恕我直言，數據顯示這將是一場硬仗。

original_text: We are ready for it.
zhtw: 我們準備好了。

original_text: Fortune can be fickle, however, as the side facing a disadvantage sometimes comes out on top.
zhtw: 運氣多變，有時劣勢的一方也能勝出。

original_text: No matter how we move, our school's tanks will not spill a single drop of tea.
zhtw: 無論如何移動，我們學校的戰車不會灑出一滴茶。

original_text: The tank is ready.
zhtw: 戰車準備就緒。

original_text: Shall we go then?
zhtw: 那就出發吧？

original_text: "Your soul is carried. To the most suitable place with destiny".
zhtw: 「你的靈魂被帶往命運中最合適之地。」

original_text: A quote from Shakespeare.
zhtw: 莎士比亞的名言。

original_text: We might have been destined to fight here today.
zhtw: 或許我們註定今日在此一戰。

original_text: Is everyone ready? Remember that we at St. Gloriana must remain elegant at all times.
zhtw: 所有人準備好了嗎？記住，聖葛羅莉安娜的我們隨時都要保持優雅。

original_text: Understood!
zhtw: 明白！

original_text: Understood!
zhtw: 明白！

original_text: Your tea is ready, Darjeeling-sama.
zhtw: 大吉嶺大人，您的茶準備好了。

original_text: The battle is about to begin. Let us try to finish up before our tea gets cold.
zhtw: 戰鬥即將開始。讓我們在茶涼前結束吧。

original_text: "Success is the child of audacity." We should not be afraid to take chances from the very start.
zhtw: 「成功是大膽之子。」我們從一開始就不該害怕冒險。

original_text: Time to move! Let us finish it quickly and enjoy our tea.
zhtw: 出發！快點結束，好好享受我們的茶。

original_text: The battle has begun. All tanks, advance!
zhtw: 戰鬥開始。全車，前進！

original_text: I have all the data we need to win. Roll out.
zhtw: 我有贏得勝利的全部數據。出發。

original_text: All set for battle, everyone? Remember to maintain elegance throughout the fight.
zhtw: 所有人準備好戰鬥了嗎？記住，整場戰鬥都要保持優雅。

original_text: Let our battle be a fair one.
zhtw: 願我們的戰鬥公平公正。

original_text: Let us hear the strategy for today from you, our commander-to-be.
zhtw: 請我們的未來指揮官分享今日的策略。

original_text: Is everyone ready? All tanks, advance!
zhtw: 所有人準備好了嗎？全車，前進！

original_text: Assam, give me the intel on our opponent.
zhtw: 阿薩姆，給我敵人的情報。

original_text: I have collected the reports from GI6 right here.
zhtw: 我已收集好GI6的報告。

original_text: Have you heard this famous quote? "Victory belongs to the most persevering". Let us keep our heads down and aim for victory.
zhtw: 你聽過這句名言嗎？「勝利屬於最堅持的人。」讓我們低調前進，目標勝利。

original_text: Understood!
zhtw: 明白！

original_text: Understood!
zhtw: 明白！

original_text: Have you heard this quote? "Do full strength for the thing which can be accomplished today".
zhtw: 你聽過這句話嗎？「全力以赴完成今日之事。」

original_text: That's Sir Isaac Newton, isn't it?
zhtw: 那是艾薩克·牛頓，對吧？

original_text: Let us do full strength for victory.
zhtw: 為了勝利全力以赴吧。

original_text: The most delicious part of a proper sandwich is not the bread, but rather the cucumbers inside.
zhtw: 真正三明治最美味的部分不是麵包，而是裡面的黃瓜。

original_text: Huh?
zhtw: 咦？

original_text: It is the fillings that provide all of the flavor.
zhtw: 內餡才是味道的關鍵。

original_text: Have you heard this quote? Brave actions never want a trumpet.
zhtw: 你聽過這句話嗎？勇敢的行動從不需要號角。

original_text: That's Thomas Fuller, isn't it?
zhtw: 那是托馬斯·富勒，對吧？

original_text: Listen up everyone. This is the time we let our Sensha-do shine!
zhtw: 大家聽好，現在是我們戰車道閃耀的時刻！

original_text: Yes! Let us try our best, Darjeeling-sama!
zhtw: 是！大吉嶺大人，我們全力以赴！

original_text: The observation device has been hit.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被擊中了。

original_text: They are hitting our observation device.
zhtw: 敵人正在攻擊我們的觀測裝置。

original_text: The enemy seems to be targetting the observation device.
zhtw: 敵人似乎在瞄準觀測裝置。

original_text: The observation device is being targeted. It might get destroyed.
zhtw: 觀測裝置正被攻擊。可能會被摧毀。

original_text: Damage to observation device confirmed. Proceed with caution.
zhtw: 觀測裝置受損確認。小心行動。

original_text: Observation device under fire. Further damage may impair functionality.
zhtw: 觀測裝置遭到攻擊。進一步損傷可能影響功能。

original_text: It seems the enemy has hit our observation device.
zhtw: 敵人似乎擊中了我們的觀測裝置。

original_text: The enemy is aiming to take down our observation device.
zhtw: 敵人正試圖摧毀我們的觀測裝置。

original_text: Observation device destroyed. We cannot see anything.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被毀。我們什麼都看不到。

original_text: The observation device is broken!
zhtw: 觀測裝置壞掉了！

original_text: The observation device has been destroyed. We have zero visibility.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被摧毀。我們的視野為零。

original_text: Observation device destroyed. We have very limited visibility. Darjeeling, are you alright?
zhtw: 觀測裝置被毀。視野極為有限。大吉嶺，你沒事吧？

original_text: The observation device is destroyed. If they hit it on purpose, they are good...
zhtw: 觀測裝置被毀。如果他們故意瞄準，真是厲害……

original_text: The observation device was destroyed. See to its repair.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被毀。進行修復。

original_text: Observation device destroyed. We must stay focused and work on its repair.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被毀。我們必須專注修復。

original_text: The observation device is down.
zhtw: 觀測裝置停止運作。

original_text: They destroyed the observation device. This will severely limit our visibility.
zhtw: 敵人摧毀了觀測裝置。這將嚴重限制我們的視野。

original_text: Observation device destroyed. We must repair it immediately.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被毀。必須立即修復。

original_text: The observation device has been repaired.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修好了。

original_text: Observation device repairs are complete.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修復完成。

original_text: We have repaired the observation device. We can see things now.
zhtw: 我們修好了觀測裝置。現在能看到了。

original_text: Observation device repaired. Darjeeling, are you able to see outside now?
zhtw: 觀測裝置修好了。大吉嶺，你現在能看到外面了嗎？

original_text: Observation device back online.
zhtw: 觀測裝置重新上線。

original_text: The observation device is fixed. The view range is back to normal.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修好了。視野範圍恢復正常。

original_text: The repairs to the observation device are now completed.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修復現已完成。

original_text: The repairs to the observation device are finished.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修復完成。

original_text: The observation device is back up. Prepare our counterattack.
zhtw: 觀測裝置恢復運作。準備反擊。

original_text: We have finished repairing the observation device. Get ready to strike back!
zhtw: 觀測裝置修復完成。準備反擊！

original_text: The observation device is back up. Stay calm and resume tracking the enemy's location.
zhtw: 觀測裝置恢復運作。保持冷靜，繼續追蹤敵人位置。

original_text: The observation device repairs are complete. Our view range is now restored.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修復完成。我們的視野範圍已恢復。

original_text: The repairs to the observation device are finished. We are ready to go.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修復完成。我們準備好了。

original_text: The observation device is now online.
zhtw: 觀測裝置現在上線。

original_text: The target has been acquired!
zhtw: 目標已鎖定！

original_text: 17-pounder, all prepared?
zhtw: 十七磅砲，準備好了嗎？

original_text: Hehehe... It is like a game of tag.
zhtw: 呵呵……就像在玩捉人遊戲。

original_text: Enemy tank acquired.
zhtw: 敵方戰車鎖定。

original_text: Darjeeling, we have acquired our target.
zhtw: 大吉嶺，我們鎖定了目標。

original_text: Attack.
zhtw: 攻擊。

original_text: Target acquired.
zhtw: 目標鎖定。

original_text: The target has disappeared.
zhtw: 目標消失了。

original_text: Huh? Where have they gone...?
zhtw: 咦？他們去哪了……？

original_text: TWe have lost... our target.
zhtw: 我們失去了……目標。

original_text: We have lost our sights on the target.
zhtw: 我們失去了目標的視線。

original_text: Let us change our target.
zhtw: 換個目標吧。

original_text: Target released.
zhtw: 目標解除。

original_text: Let us target another tank.
zhtw: 鎖定另一輛戰車吧。

original_text: Nothing could be more inelegant than a relentless pursuit.
zhtw: 沒有比執著追擊更不雅的事了。

original_text: Changing target.
zhtw: 更換目標。

original_text: Changing target to a different tank.
zhtw: 更換到另一輛戰車。

original_text: This kind of simplistic bait-and-switch strategy will not work on us.
zhtw: 這種簡單的誘敵策略對我們無效。

original_text: Switching targets.
zhtw: 切換目標。

original_text: Focus on another tank.
zhtw: 專注於另一輛戰車。

original_text: Let us find another target.
zhtw: 找另一個目標吧。

original_text: Let us leave this tank to our allies.
zhtw: 把這輛戰車留給盟友吧。

original_text: Let us pursue a different enemy.
zhtw: 追擊另一個敵人吧。

original_text: Let us stop over-pursuing this particular tank.
zhtw: 別過分追擊這輛戰車了。

original_text: The tracks are damaged. They won't stand another hit.
zhtw: 履帶受損。恐怕再也承受不住一擊。

original_text: The tracks are hit.
zhtw: 履帶被擊中了。

original_text: The enemy is targeting the tracks. It is highly likely that another hit will destroy them.
zhtw: 敵人正瞄準履帶。很可能再一擊就摧毀它們。

original_text: The tracks have been damaged. Another hit will destroy them completely.
zhtw: 履帶受損。再一擊將完全摧毀它們。

original_text: We have lost movement. See to the repairs immediately!
zhtw: 我們失去機動性。立即修復！

original_text: The tracks have been destroyed. We canot move...
zhtw: 履帶被摧毀。我們動不了了……

original_text: Tracks destroyed. We are at a tight spot.
zhtw: 履帶被毀。我們陷入困境了。

original_text: The enemy has destroyed our tracks. We are not able to move.
zhtw: 敵人摧毀了我們的履帶。我們無法移動。

original_text: The repairs to the tracks are complete. Well done.
zhtw: 履帶修復完成。幹得好。

original_text: The track repairs are complete.
zhtw: 履帶修復完成。

original_text: It seems the tracks have been restored.
zhtw: 履帶似乎已恢復。

original_text: The tracks are now operational.
zhtw: 履帶現在能運作了。

original_text: The track repairs are complete. You should be able to move again.
zhtw: 履帶修復完成。你應該能再次移動了。

original_text: The tracks are operational.
zhtw: 履帶恢復運作。

original_text: The repairs to the tracks are now complete.
zhtw: 履帶修復現已完成。

original_text: The tracks are repaired. Let us move quickly.
zhtw: 履帶修好了。我們快移動吧。

original_text: Track repairs are completed.
zhtw: 履帶修復完成。

original_text: We've repaired the tracks.
zhtw: 我們修好了履帶。

original_text: Thank you, Pekoe.
zhtw: 謝謝你，白毫。

original_text: The tracks have been restored. Stay alert as you head out.
zhtw: 履帶已恢復。出發時保持警戒。

original_text: Copy that.
zhtw: 收到。

original_text: Turret rotation mechanism damaged. Its turn speed is dropping.
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構受損。轉動速度下降。

original_text: The turret rotation mechanism has been damaged. Be mindful of its reduced turning speed.
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構受損。注意轉動速度降低。

original_text: The turret rotation mechanism is hit. Be aware of its reduced turning speed.
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構被擊中。注意轉動速度降低。

original_text: Turret rotation mechanism destroyed. The turret is unable to move.
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構被毀。砲塔無法移動。

original_text: Turret rotation mechanism destroyed. Can I rely on you for its immediate repair?
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構被毀。能否立即修復？

original_text: On it, Darjeeling-sama!
zhtw: 遵命，大吉嶺大人！

original_text: The turret rotation mechanism is destroyed. The turret can't be moved...
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構被毀。砲塔動不了了……

original_text: The turret rotation mechanism has been destroyed. Please repair it at once.
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構被毀。請立即修復。

original_text: The turret has been restored. We can turn it now.
zhtw: 砲塔恢復了。我們現在能轉動它了。

original_text: Turret rotation mechanism restored. The turret should have mobility now.
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構恢復。砲塔現在應該能移動了。

original_text: Stay calm and retreat. We at St. Gloriana must remain elegant at all times.
zhtw: 保持冷靜，撤退。聖葛羅莉安娜的我們隨時都要保持優雅。

original_text: My data didn't forsee such a situation...
zhtw: 我的數據沒能預見這種情況……

original_text: "Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood".
zhtw: 「人生是一連串的教訓，必須親身經歷才能理解。」

original_text: That's the American thinker Ralph Waldo Emerson, isn't it?
zhtw: 那是美國思想家愛默生，對吧？

original_text: We have learned our lessons.
zhtw: 我們已學到教訓。

original_text: Well played. What might your name be?
zhtw: 打得好。你叫什麼名字？

original_text: Even though it's a friendly match, we might have been a little too careless.
zhtw: 雖然是友誼賽，但我們可能太疏忽了。
